issue.title: [C++] Rename fs::FileStats to fs::FileInfo
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7977](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7977). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If we use FileInfo instead of FileStats, we can use singular form
"info" and plural form "infos" as variable names instead of "stats"
and "stats_vector". It will help writing readable code.
